title: Funko Pop 10147 DC Comics Super Heroes Steampunk Batman Vinyl Figurine
features: Funko Pop DC Comics series super heroes collectable
description: Vinyl Funko Pop figurine. The Steampunk version of a batman. Funko Pop. The figurines are stylised and ironic versions of characters from films, television series, animated series, comic books, video games and much more! Figures are approximately 10 cm high and are either in the bobble-head version which is fitted with spring-loaded, "shaky head", or the static version.
